example_sentence_italian: Il tema della giornata è il clima.
example_sentence_english: The theme of the day is the climate.
We rent the car by the day.
We think about the future days.
I learned a lot from the day.
I take inspiration from the past days.
I will write to you during the day.
I wrote notes about the day.
I read articles about short days.

example_sentence_italian: Con la giornata piovosa restiamo a casa.
example_sentence_english: With the rainy day we stay at home.
We go out with the long days.
